biography: Song Kang-ho (송강호) is a South Korean actor. Born on January 17, 1967, he first worked in plays, entering a troupe. He started working in films as a supporting actor in minor roles.  He made the breakthrough in 'Green Fish' in a supporting role which had a major impact. In 'No. 3' he actually created a syndrome from his role, when people started imitating his acting.
name: Song Kang-ho
